TEXT: The applicant , Mr PERSON , is a NORP national who was born in DATE and lives in GPE Tagil . The respondent Government were represented by PERSON , former Representative of GPE at ORG . The applicant was represented by PERSON , a lawyer practising in GPE .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .
On DATE the applicant was arrested on suspicion of murder . He was allegedly ill - treated by police officers in order to obtain a confession .

On TIME CARDINAL officials of the temporary detention facility in PERSON stopped the applicant in the corridor and ordered him to do push ups . When the applicant refused , they beat him with a truncheon and kicked him .
On DATE the applicant was transferred to remand centre no . IZ CARDINAL/CARDINAL in PERSON . On DATE he underwent a medical examination . The doctor recorded CARDINAL large bruises on his back .

The applicant complained of ill - treatment to the investigator . On DATE he was questioned about the circumstances in which he had received injuries . On DATE the investigator forwarded the complaint to ORG . On DATE ORG refused to initiate criminal proceedings against the officials of the temporary detention facility .

As the applicant was not informed of the outcome of the inquiry , on DATE his lawyer asked the trial court to obtain a copy of the prosecutor ’s decision on the applicant ’s complaint of ill - treatment . The prosecutor submitted a copy of the decision of DATE at the request of the trial court . The decision was read out during the hearing .
On DATE ORG convicted the applicant of aggravated murder and sentenced him to DATE imprisonment . On DATE ORG of GPE upheld the judgment on appeal .

On DATE Mr Z. , a deputy head of correctional colony no . CARDINAL in ORG Tagil , summoned the applicant to his office . According to the applicant , Mr PERSON asked him whether he had complained to the ORG and of what he had complained . He then asked whether the applicant was interested in reaching a friendly - settlement agreement and what his terms were . The applicant refused to discuss the issue of a friendly settlement because he was afraid of being cheated .

The Government submitted CARDINAL written affidavits by the applicant , CARDINAL undated and the other dated DATE , stating that in DATE he had had discussions with PERSON and PERSON , officials from ORG of GPE . He had been asked questions about the events of DATE and about his application to the ORG . He had not been subjected to any pressure and had not been urged to abandon his application .
